purpose: The email is to announce the opening of applications for the 2025 Summer School on Informatics Education Research (SCHIER).
evidence_sentences: Applications are now open for the 2025 Summer School on Informatics Education Research (SCHIER).
SCHIER: the only summer school in Europe exclusively focused on research in Informatics Education.
Applications are now open, limited to 40 participants on a first-come, first-served basis.
